post.body: Ha, I do that often with my mom about school in general. I tend to use the word "vile" a lot.
What'd Giz do?
I'll refrain from any sexual position jokes. I promise.
I've found a good backhand slap to the face works well.
Sounds like high school.
Hey man, sometimes you need a break after fiddling with a server for an hour. Happens to me sometimes, though we have linux.
Yeah, the company that bought our current 88.1 tower wants to double our rent. I have to look for alternatives now.
Mmm...ice cream. What flavour? I have double chocolate fudge at my house. Also, we need to get you some more Tweeps.
Yeah, that's definitely more hitable.
Dude, I was just thinking of that.
@Cyclopsean Wenda looks pretty butch.
Aye.
Ha, awesome. Great minds think alike.
Honestly, I sometimes spend more time than I should when picking out my shirt for the day.
I'd love you even more.
They're actually Obama magnets. I can peel them off whenever I please.
Except for the part where he's a crusader for religious fanatics.
Ha, another road closure?
Yeah, welcome to what I had to suffer through on Saturday. Hopefully they'll be back soon.
Rumours is delish.
http://twitpic.com/s8w0 - Fucken awesome!
Yeah, I can see that happening, though @hidama uses it, and she's an elite Tweetist.
I'm down. Just let me know when.
It's not whining, it's cynical critique. If we hang out in real life you'd understand.
TweetDeck is my catch up with Twitter app, Twhirl is my main app.
I only purchase/recommend Seagate for hard drives.
Holy crap, yes. Microwaving it before eating is a must.
Sounds good. Current rotation is damn sexy.
Yeah, sounds about right.
Whoa, seriously?
...you're a fairy!
Night, sir.
...ouch. I don't know...just let your body naturally absorb it?
Florida City is ghetto redneck. It's fantastic, really.
We play all the games in their entirety (minus 100% completion and nonsense like that) as quickly as we can.
Okay. If I find some more stuff I'll send it to you.
YES. @doomsdayblaze can make the trip down.
I've been off of Twitter for a few days because of http://zeldathon.com and just noticed my following/followers discrepancy.
Oh jeez, I just saw your tweet about me not following you anymore. It wasn't me, I swear!
Yeah, I went to bed at 5am. Keeping me company on the chat is as good as any present I can think of.
Ah, childhood Disney.
That's fine with me.
Dr. Who is amazing, pretty much.
What type of mp3 and computer?
re: Christmas. I do.
I do need sleep, and I'm about to get it. After a nice, warm shower.
re:awesomeness. You should. It'll keep me going. I have no idea how I did it, honestly.
I do rock. So hard.
I'm headed off to bed, Twitter. I'll see you on the morrow.
Dinner time..at midnight. Sigh.
Back home from work/school. Time to shower.
I do not want to do these Excel assigments.
Done with the gym. Good workout, today. Finished all of my sets.
So, instead of studying I've been working on finding the station a new tower.
I should probably re-word that to "isn't as bad as I thought."
Huh, my GPA is better than I thought. I guess I'm not in as much trouble as I originally thought.
I think Tweetdeck will be my "catch up with Twitter" app and Twhirl will be my main, while I'm actively on the computer app.
Back at the station, taking care of some work. Twitter seems to be slow today, but that's nice from time to time.
http://twitpic.com/rq0a - Very true.
At the gym.
I have too many shirts to choose from. I have like, at least 30 graphic tees. What a wonderful problem.
Thinking of doing Charlie Brown Christmas soundtrack on my show since it's from '65, and honestly, what's more rock n' roll than that?
Going to clean up the room and then head out to the gym.
Time for bed. G'night all.
Am I crazy if I want to Jack Kerouac-speak poetry over Charlie Brown piano music?
God damn it, Apple! Why'd you put A Charlie Brown Christmas Soundtrack on iTunes Store's front page? You knew I'd buy it.
Fucken Gmail captcha hackers...
So, I need to watch the Adventures of Milo and Otis very soon.
Going to watch "On the Waterfront" with Marlon Brando. Anyone seen it?
http://twitpic.com/s9qc - Cirque du Soleil tent.
http://twitpic.com/s88g - Someone order a palm tree?
Headed off to pick up Eric in the airport, then watching Cirque Du Soleil with his parents. I'm sure I've been annoying you all, anyway :P
An open challenge to @listenveryhard: Christmasize my icon. It's tricky, but I know you can do it.
Comcast guys left without saying goodbye. How rude. Oh well, fast internets!
They gave me another modem model. Working way faster. I almost hit 11mbps. Now they're putting the cable underground in the yard.
Why is it with modems, the uglier the better?
Why does he feel the need to test the internet with streaming MTV videos?
They're going with a different model now. It's made by Harris, which is also the brand of my station's transmitters. Awesome.
Oh, god. I just realized a similarity between my Father and I. Ew.
Time to watch The Office and 30 Rock.
Shower time.
Done with my slot. Headed back home.
Doing the jazz: http://wrgp.org
Off to the station to do an hour of cool jazz on @cyclopsean's all night show: http://wrgp.org
So, now that it's only a matter of time before Netflix does widespread HD streaming, and I have an upscaling DVD player, I want an HDTV.
Finally taking care of some Christmas shopping. Bought 3 gifts. Need 4 more.
I think I may just give everyone a shirt for Christmas. That's cool, right?
Also, put*. Shoulder doesn't seem as bad I as initially thought. I'll know for sure tomorrow.
I totally out myself in a half nelson and messed up my right shoulder while doing squats.
Off to the gym.
Practicing Super Metroid.
Oh yeah, so I lost two pounds during Zeldathon.
Why did Twitter take off @dwardin9 my follow list? Sorry, sir. Just put you back on.
In a span of 111 hours, I only slept 10 of those. Holy crap.
I could go back to bed and easily sleep 14 hours straight.
Mornin' everyone. I still have hours upon hours of sleep I want to get, but I should probably get up.
I am going to sleep so hard.
Mild hallucinations are starting to set in.
First glass of water in more than 24 hours. Amazing.
Jazz station playing Charlie Brown Christmas soundtrack on my drive home. Fuck yes.
